items.title: England unable to hold out as Australia retain the Ashes
items.summary: Australia beat England by 82 runs to take a 3-0 series lead and retain the Ashes urn on day five of the third Test in Adelaide.

items.title: Injured spinner Lyon a doubt for rest of Ashes
items.summary: Spinner Nathan Lyon is a doubt for the remainder of the Ashes after suffering a hamstring injury in Australia's series-sealing win in Adelaide.

items.title: The 10 moments that decided the Ashes
items.summary: Australia have regained the Ashes after winning the first three Tests against England down under once again - here are the 10 moments that decided the destination of the urn.

items.title: The moment that Australia retained the Ashes
items.summary: Marnus Labuschagne takes the catch from Josh Tongue as England are bowled out for 352, giving Australia an 82 run win and a 3-0 series lead to retain The Ashes on day five in Adelaide.

items.title: England beaten to lose another Ashes in Australia
items.summary: England's Bazball regime is in tatters as yet another Ashes series in Australia is lost at the earliest possible opportunity.

items.title: 'Test career over for now?' - Ashes player ratings
items.summary: Chief cricket reporter Stephan Shemilt marks the performances of the Australia and England teams after the third Test in Adelaide.

items.title: 'That's the wicket' - Labuschagne takes brilliant grab to dismiss Jacks
items.summary: Marnus Labuschagne takes another brilliant catch at slip as Will Jacks is dismissed for 47 to leave England on 337-8 on day five of the third Ashes Test in Adelaide.

items.summary: Dominic Calvert-Lewin extends his scoring streak to five Premier League games with a superb double as Leeds United secure a comfortable victory over Crystal Palace at Elland Road.

items.summary: Great Britain's Marcus Wyatt beats team-mate Matt Weston to World Cup gold in the men's skeleton in Sigulda, Latvia, while Zoe Atkin claims halfpipe gold in Colorado.

items.title: Chelsea fight back to claim draw at Newcastle
items.summary: Nick Woltemade scores an early double, but Chelsea fight back to claim a 2-2 draw against Newcastle United at St James' Park.

The battle for Los Angeles is taking place this weekend with the Lakers and Clippers going head-to-head at Intuit Dome. LeBron James and Luka DonÄiÄ‡ are heading over to Inglewood to face their in-city rivals led by James Harden and Kawhi Leonard. With a 19-7 record, Team Purple and Gold look to keep up their momentum and two-game winning streak. On the other hand, the Clippers are still trying to find their footing with a shocking 6-21 record. There’s still time to turn things around, but with the Lakers playing high quality basketball at the moment, tonight’s game will be a tough matchup for the home squad. If you don’t have cable, NBA fans can catch the LA showdown on Sling TV . Here’s everything you need to know about upcoming basketball game including how to stream online. items.title: Rufus Wainwright, Lucius & Lord Huron Added to L.A. Wildfire Anniversary BenefitÂ Concert
items.summary: The John C. Reilly-hosted event will be held on Jan. 7 at the Pasadena Civic Auditorium.
items.body: The Concert for Altadena has expanded its lineup ahead of the benefit supporting Californians affected by last yearâ€™s deadly wildfires. Rufus Wainwright, Lucius, Lord Huron and Taboo of the Black Eyed Peas have joined the roster for the Jan. 7, 2026, show at the Pasadena Civic Auditorium. The one-night-only concert, benefiting those impacted by the Eaton Fire, will be hosted by Altadena resident John C. Reilly, whose home was destroyed in the blaze. Organized by the band Dawes , the event will also feature previously announced performers, including Brandon Flowers of The Killers and Brad Paisley. Other artists on the lineup include Eric Krasno, Aloe Blacc, Jackson Browne, Judith Hill, Jenny Lewis, Mandy Moore, Stephen Stills, Everclear and Ozomatli. Proceeds will support the Altadena Builds Back Foundation , which helps rebuild homes destroyed in the fires. The Eaton Fire ravaged the region, killing 19 people, forcing 100,000 residents to flee, and leveling nearly 9,500 structures. “January 7th marks a year to the day that our sweet town got ravaged by the Eaton Fire,” Dawes wrote on Instagram in October. “Itâ€™s gonna be a heavy night, but itâ€™s going to be a beautâ€¦

items.title: Munster rise to second in URC win against Ospreys
items.summary: Munster heap more misery on Ospreys as their United Rugby Championship bonus-point win lifts the Irish province to second in the table.

items.title: 'Do we want to be remembered for fighting or being cowards?'
items.summary: Relegation from the Premier League looks inevitable for Wolves after a 15th defeat in 17 games - but will they avoid setting more unwanted records?

items.title: No fireworks but Glasgow put one hand on 1872 Cup
items.summary: The pre-match pyrotechnics at Hampden Park brought colour and noise, but there was a distinct lack of fireworks when Glasgow and Edinburgh faced off.

items.title: Paul has titanium plates fitted after Joshua breaks his jaw
items.summary: Jake Paul's jaw is broken in two places by Anthony Joshua during their heavyweight fight in Miami.

items.title: Guardiola happy Man City challenging on all fronts
items.summary: Man City boss Pep Guardiola is pleased with the intensity of the pressing of his forward players and his defence as well after his side comfortably beat West Ham 3-0 at the Etihad Stadium.

items.title: Bowen Yang Confirms Midseason Departure From â€˜SNLâ€™ After Ariana Grandeâ€“HostedÂ Episode
items.summary: "The show doesnâ€™t go on because itâ€™s ready, but sâ€”t, I hope I am," he wrote on Instagram.
items.body: Bowen Yang , coming off a huge year or two of projects, will depart Saturday Night Live mid-season after Saturdayâ€™s (Dec. 20) episode hosted by his Wicked buddy Ariana Grande. He joined the show as a writer in 2018, became a featured player the following season and was promoted to the main cast two seasons after that. Yang was a fan favorite with five Emmy nominations over the years. Related Bowen Yang to Exit ‘Saturday Night Live’ After Ariana Grande-Hosted Episode: Reports Ariana Grande & Bowen Yang’s ‘Moonstruck’ Dreams Come True in ‘SNL’ Promos: ‘Cher Just Slapped Us!’ Every ‘Saturday Night Live’ Cast Member Leaving & Joining the Show Ahead of Season 51 (Updating) A Saturday Night Live representative wouldnâ€™t comment Friday (Dec. 19) on Yangâ€™s departure. His representatives didnâ€™t respond to email requests for comment. In an Instagram post Saturday, Yang wrote: â€œi loved working at SNL, and most of all i loved the people. i was there at a time when many things in the world started to seem futile, but working at 30 rock taught me the value in showing up anyway when people make it worthwhile.â€¦

items.title: Were Newcastle denied 'stonewall' penalty against Chelsea?
items.summary: Newcastle United manager Eddie Howe says his side were denied a "stonewall" penalty in their 2-2 draw with Chelsea - so, does he have a point?

items.title: Exeter go top with dramatic late win at Saracens
items.summary: Exeter score three late tries in a fightback to beat Saracens at StoneX Stadium and go top of the Prem table.

items.title: Kildunne scores superb solo try as Quins beat Bristol
items.summary: England star - and BBC Sports Personality of the Year 2025 runner-up - Ellie Kildunne scores a sensational solo try as Harlequins beat Bristol Bears at Allianz Stadium.

items.title: Glenavon stun Linfield as Larne go top for Christmas
items.summary: Champions Linfield lose ground in the Irish Premiership title race as they suffer a shock 2-1 defeat by bottom side Glenavon at Mourneview Park.

items.title: Glasgow secure bonus-point 1872 Cup win over Edinburgh
items.summary: Glasgow Warriors take a big step towards winning the 1872 Cup for the fourth year running with a bonus-point first-leg victory over Edinburgh at Hampden.

items.title: Maresca hints at wanting older heads at end of chaotic week
items.summary: Blues manager Enzo Maresca hints that having some more experience in his squad would be beneficial following their comeback to earn a point at Newcastle.

items.title: Rauw Alejandroâ€™s Free Concert in Dominican Republic & More Uplifting Moments in LatinÂ Music
items.summary: Plus, the Latin Grammy Cultural Foundation announces the 2026 Noel Schajris Scholarship.
items.body: From career milestones to new music releases to major announcements and those little important moments,  Billboard  editors highlight uplifting moments in Latin music. Hereâ€™s what happened in the Latin music world this week. Following his Cosa Nuestra tour, the event featured guest performances by local stars such as ToÃ±o Rosario, Wilfrido Vargas, NTG, Dalvin La MelodÃ­a, YK Itâ€™s Junaa, J Noa, Jezzy, Jey One and Saso. The night culminated with a surprise appearance by Puerto Rican rapper Clarent. “Thank you Santo Domingo for being with me this past Saturday at our ‘Caribbean Night,’ a gift from the heart for you,” the superstar wrote on Instagram. items.body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. Ariana Grande is heading back to Saturday Night Live . The Wicked: For Good star will close out the first half of season 51 as host for the third time this weekend on December 20. The special Christmas show will also have another iconic musical guest on the booking, Cher , whose last SNL musical performance was in 1987. SNL airs on NBC at 11:30 p.m. ET/PT. In more unexpected turn of events, Grande’s Wicked co-star, Bowen Yang, is leaving the sketch comedy show after seven years. Yang’s SNL career started in 2018 as a writer for Season 44, became a featured player in Season 45, and was promoted to the main cast in Season 47. This upcoming Christmas show will be his last hurrah at Studio 8H for now. Want to watch SNL online without cable and for free? items.title: Nick Reinerâ€™s Early Struggles Recalled by Former Teacher: â€˜Beyond Any ofÂ Usâ€™
items.summary: â€œThey were incredibly passionate, all-in parents doing their best,â€ Zabel said.
items.body: A former yoga instructor who worked closely with the Reiner family during Nick Reinerâ€™s childhood is spoke to about early behavioral challenges she witnessed years before the deaths of filmmaker Rob Reiner and producer Michele Singer Reiner. Speaking exclusively to PEOPLE , Zabel described Nickâ€™s childhood behavior as complex and difficult to manage, characterizing it as â€œa perfect stormâ€ that resisted simple solutions. â€œAs hard as they tried to manage it, get help, address it,â€ she said, â€œitâ€™s just beyond any of us to be able to diffuse.â€ According to Zabel, Rob and Michele Reiner sought additional support rather than disengaging. After years of group lessons, the couple asked her to begin working with Nick privately in an effort to help him regulate his emotions and energy. â€œThey asked me to teach Nicky privately, which I started to do, to help him to calm down and channel his energy,â€ she said. Zabel noted that while there were moments of progress during those one-on-one sessions, the broader challenges persisted. â€œNickâ€™s issues as a child were beyond any of us,â€ she said, adding that the family consistently explored different approaches to help him. She described Rob and Micheâ€¦

items.title: Olivia Dean Tightens Grip on ARIA Charts With Third Week at No.Â 1
items.summary: The achievement adds to a standout year for women on the ARIA albums tally.
items.body: Olivia Dean shows no signs of loosening her hold on Australiaâ€™s charts. Her second album, The Art of Loving , remains at No. 1 on the ARIA Albums Chart for a third non-consecutive week, extending one of the yearâ€™s most consistent chart runs. The achievement adds to a standout year for women on the ARIA albums tally. Dean becomes the ninth female artist to land a No. 1 album in 2025, joining a list that includes Sabrina Carpenter, Gracie Abrams, Tate McRae, Billie Eilish, Lady Gaga, Ariana Grande, Lorde and Taylor Swift â€” a run thatâ€™s shaped much of the yearâ€™s chart narrative. Dean is also doubling up at the top. Her single â€œMan I Needâ€ clocks a fifth straight week at No. 1 on the ARIA Singles Chart, making her the fourth solo female artist to lead the singles tally in 2025, alongside Lola Young, Doechii and Swift. The yearâ€™s singles race has largely been driven by women, from RosÃ©â€™s extended reign with â€œAPT.â€ featuring Bruno Mars to the surprise dominance of â€œGoldenâ€ by fictional K-pop group HUNTR/X from KPop Demon Hunters . Further down the albums chart, new releases and catalogue favorites share the spotlight. The 50th anniversary edition of Pink Floydâ€™s Wish You Were Here opensâ€¦

items.title: Fugees Rapper Pras Michel Wants to Postpone 14-Year Prison Sentence: â€˜This Wasnâ€™t a FairÂ Trialâ€™
items.summary: Pras says his upcoming appeal will reveal huge problems with his 2023 jury trial, including "unprecedented" behavior by the judge.
items.body: Fugees rapper Pras Michel says he should stay out of prison while he appeals his illegal foreign lobbying convictions and resulting 14-year prison sentence, citing â€œegregiousâ€ errors during his trial. The rapper, who rose to fame alongside his Fugee bandmates Lauryn Hill and Wyclef Jean , is set to surrender next month to serve his lengthy sentence for running a â€œforeign influence campaignâ€ to get the U.S. to drop an investigation into fugitive Malaysian financier Jho Low. Related The 10 Biggest Music and Politics Stories of 2025 But in a new filing on Friday (Dec. 19), his lawyers say he should be allowed to appeal the verdict before he reports to prison, since his appeal will reveal huge problems with his 2023 jury trial and could end in â€œreversal of nearly every count.â€ â€œNeither the D.C. Circuit nor any other Court of Appeals has ever confronted this extraordinary degree of improper jury influence, which appears to be unprecedented,â€ Michelâ€™s lawyers write. In a statement, Michel spokeswoman Erica Dumas said: â€œThis wasn’t a fair trial. This was a coronation of guilt. We’re confident the appeals court will recognize this case for what it is, an unprecedented triâ€¦

items.title: NASA Shares SpaceX Crew-12 Assignments for Space Station Mission
items.summary: As part of NASAâ€™s SpaceX Crew-12 mission, four crew members from three space agencies will launch no earlier than Sunday, Feb. 15, 2026, to the International Space Station for a long-duration science expedition. NASA astronauts Jessica Meir and Jack Hathaway will serve as spacecraft commander and pâ€¦
items.body: From left to right, NASA astronauts Jessica Meir and Jack Hathaway, ESA (European Space Agency) astronaut Sophie Adenot, and Roscosmos cosmonaut Andrey Fedyaev. Credit: NASA As part of NASAâ€™s SpaceX Crew-12 mission, four crew members from three space agencies will launch no earlier than Sunday, Feb. 15, 2026, to the International Space Station for a long-duration science expedition. NASA astronauts Jessica Meir and Jack Hathaway will serve as spacecraft commander and pilot, respectively, and will be accompanied by ESA (European Space Agency) astronaut Sophie Adenot and Roscosmos cosmonaut Andrey Fedyaev, who will both serve as mission specialists. Crew-12 will join Expedition 74 crew members currently aboard the space station. The flight is the 12th crew rotation with SpaceX to the orbiting laboratory as part of NASAâ€™s Commercial Crew Program . Crew-12 will conduct scientific investigations and technology demonstrations to help prepare humans for future exploration missions to the Moon and Mars, as well as benefit people on Earth. This will be the second flight to the space station for Meir, who was selected as a NASA astronaut in 2013. The Caribou, Maine, native earned a bachelorâ€¦

items.summary: NASAâ€™s Johnson Space Center in Houston closed 2025 with major progress across human spaceflight, research, and exploration. items.body: NASA’s Johnson Space Center in Houston closed 2025 with major progress across human spaceflight, research, and exploration. From Artemis II mission preparations to science aboard the International Space Station, teams at Johnson helped prepare for future missions to the Moon and, ultimately, Mars. Orion Stacked for Artemis II, Orion Mission Evaluation Room Unveiled   NASAâ€™s Artemis II Orion spacecraft with its launch abort system is stacked atop the agencyâ€™s SLS (Space Launch System) rocket in High Bay 3 of the Vehicle Assembly Building at NASAâ€™s Kennedy Space Center in Florida on Oct. 20, 2025. NASA/Kim Shiflett As NASA prepares for the crewed Artemis II mission , a 10-day journey around the Moon and back in early 2026, teams at Johnson continue work to ensure the Orion spacecraft is flight-ready. The mission will carry NASA astronauts Reid Wiseman, Victor Glover, Christina Koch, and CSA (Canadian Space Agency) astronaut Jeremy Hansen.  In October, NASA completed stacking of the Orion spacecraft and launch abort system atop the agencyâ€™s SLS (Space Launch System) rocket inside the Vehicle Assembly Building at NASAâ€™s Kennedy Space Center in Florida. Following Orion â€¦

items.title: Water Droplet Science
items.summary: NASA astronaut Don Pettit demonstrates electrostatic forces using charged water droplets and a knitting needle made of Teflon. This series of overlapping frames from Feb. 19, 2025, displays the unique attraction-repulsion properties of Teflon and charged droplets, similar to how charged particles fâ€¦
items.body: NASA/Don Pettit NASA astronaut Don Pettit demonstrates electrostatic forces using charged water droplets and a knitting needle made of Teflon. This series of overlapping frames from Feb. 19, 2025, displays the unique attraction-repulsion properties of Teflon and charged droplets, similar to how charged particles from the Sun behave when they come in contact with Earthâ€™s magnetic field. Highly energetic particles from space that collide with atoms and molecules in the atmosphere create the  aurora borealis . Explore more of what Pettit has coined â€œscience of opportunity.â€ Image credit: NASA/Don Pettit

items.title: Betelgeuse and the Crab Nebula: Stellar Death and Rebirth
items.summary: In 2019, Betelgeuse dimmed in brightness, sparking speculation that it may soon explode as a supernova. While it likely wonâ€™t explode quite yet, we can preview its fate by observing the nearby Crab Nebula.
items.body: 3 Min Read Betelgeuse and the Crab Nebula: Stellar Death and Rebirth This highly detailed image of the Crab Nebula was assembled by combining data from five telescopes spanning nearly the entire breadth of the electromagnetic spectrum: The Very Large Array (radio) in red; Spitzer Space Telescope (infrared) in yellow; Hubble Space Telescope (visible) in green; XMM-Newton (ultraviolet) in blue; and Chandra X-ray Observatory (X-ray) in purple. Credits: NASA, ESA, G. Dubner (IAFE, CONICET-University of Buenos Aires) et al.; A. Loll et al.; T. Temim et al.; F. Seward et al.; VLA/NRAO/AUI/NSF; Chandra/CXC; Spitzer/JPL-Caltech; XMM-Newton/ESA; and Hubble/STScI What happens when a star dies? In 2019, Betelgeuse dimmed in brightness , sparking speculation that it may soon explode as a supernova. While it likely wonâ€™t explode quite yet, we can preview its fate by observing the nearby Crab Nebula. A view of the constellations Orion and Taurus, along with notable features: Betelgeuse in Orion, and Aldebaran and the Crab Nebula in Taurus. Stellarium Web Betelgeuse is easy to find as the red-hued shoulder star of Orion. A variable star, Betelgeuse, usually competes with the brilliant blue-whiteâ€¦

items.body: Curiosity Navigation Curiosity Home Mission Overview Where is Curiosity? Mission Updates Science Overview Instruments Highlights Exploration Goals News and Features Multimedia Curiosity Raw Images Images Videos Audio Mosaics More Resources Mars Missions Mars Sample Return Mars Perseverance Rover Mars Curiosity Rover MAVEN Mars Reconnaissance Orbiter Mars Odyssey More Mars Missions Mars Home 3 min read Curiosity Blog, Sols 4743-4749: Polygons in the Hollow NASAâ€™s Mars rover Curiosity acquired this close-up image of polygon-shaped features in the â€œMonte Grandeâ€ boxwork hollow. Similar polygonal patterns in various strata were seen previously, elsewhere in Gale Crater. Curiosity captured the image using its Mars Hand Lens Imager (MAHLI), located on the turret at the end of the roverâ€™s robotic arm, on Dec. 11, 2025 â€” Sol 4745, or Martian day 4,745 of the Mars Science Laboratory mission â€” at 16:55:37 UTC. items.title: All the Sports Personality 2025 winners
items.summary: All the award winners at BBC Sports Personality of the Year 2025, as Rory McIlroy claims the top prize.

items.title: Remembering the sports stars we lost in 2025
items.summary: A host of figures from the world of sport died in 2025 - BBC Sport remembers some of those sporting names.

items.title: Salah seeks Afcon success with Egypt as Morocco eye home glory
items.summary: Two of African football's biggest names, Achraf Hakimi and Mohamed Salah, are hoping to lead their nations to glory as the Africa Cup of Nations gets ready to kick off in Morocco.

items.title: Sutton's predictions v Zambian rapper Sampa the Great
items.summary: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Zambian rapper Sampa the Great - and AI - with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
